actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for patient protection by establishing safe nurse staffing levels at certain Medicare providers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Safe Staffing for Nurse and Patient Safety Act of 2018

summary.text:
Safe Staffing for Nurse and Patient Safety Act of 2018

This bill requires hospitals, as a condition of Medicare participation, to develop staffing plans for nursing services in accordance with specified criteria.
